description: First attested in 1875. abortion +‎ -facient (“causing an”), from Latin facere (“to make”).

adjectives.description: abortifacient (comparative more abortifacient, superlative most abortifacient)

entries.meaning: (pharmacology) Producing miscarriage. [First attested in the mid 19th century.]
(pharmacology) A drug or an agent that induces an abortion. [First attested in the mid 19th century.]
